## put() function

Expose a Controller method as a REST API operation mapped to `PUT` request method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function put(path: string, spec?: OperationObject): MethodDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | The URL path of this operation, e.g. <code>/product/{id}</code> |
|  spec | OperationObject | _(Optional)_ The OpenAPI specification describing parameters and responses of this operation. |

**Returns:**

MethodDecorator
